translation:
Hello! 👋 This is the Telegram bot FrescoAiBot for interacting with the language model ChatGPT and the image generation neural network Dall-E 🤖

In my free version, you have access to 5️⃣ requests per day (they reset every 24 hours). You can increase the number of requests with a monthly subscription:

✅ Start: 1️⃣0️⃣ requests per day — $4.5
✅ Pro: 2️⃣0️⃣ requests per day — $9.9
✅ Boss: 5️⃣0️⃣ requests per day — $19.9

💸 Buy subscription /buy

🎁 I also love giving gifts! You can invite a friend and receive a "Start" subscription for 7 days for free. To get a referral link, use the /invite command.

💸 Choose a monthly subscription:

✅ Start: 1️⃣0️⃣ requests per day — $4.5
✅ Pro: 2️⃣0️⃣ requests per day — $9.9
✅ Boss: 5️⃣0️⃣ requests per day — $19.9

💸 Buy a subscription:
Tether (USDT) TRC20: TBbdyory2Bc4csT5Xc4tieEHptD2XEKeRW
❌ Something went wrong. 🤕 Try again later.

📊 Subscription Information

Your subscription: %s (%d requests per day)
Available: %d requests
Valid until: %s
Contact: @dendefoe

🎁 Invite a friend and get a "Start" subscription for 7 days for free. To receive a referral link, use the command /invite

💸 Buy a subscription: /buy
❌ Sorry, the message type you sent is currently not supported
❌ You have sent a message that is too short. The minimum number of characters is 4.

🔧 Bot Settings

In this section, you can:

✅ Select the interface language (English/Russian).

🤖 Choose the ChatGPT mode for working with text information.
FrescoAiBot offers 2 versions:

- GPT-3.5 — this is an advanced next-generation model after GPT-3 (Generative Pre-trained Transformer 3), which is one of the most powerful models for text generation.

- GPT-4 has a larger number of parameters than GPT-3. It has improved abilities in understanding and generating texts, as well as in tasks that require logical thinking and context recognition.

🎨 Choose the Dall-E 3 mode for image generation.

💬 Enable or disable context support (dialogue mode). When the context is activated, the bot takes its previous response into account and builds upon it.

😥 Sorry, you have run out of messages.

Contact: @dendefoe

🎁 Invite a friend and get a "Start" subscription for 7 days for free. To get a referral link, use the /invite command.
💸 To purchase a subscription: /buy

🎁 Invite a friend

Invite a friend through the link and receive a "Start" gift for 7 days:

 `https://t.me/call_fresco_bot?start=ref%d`

🎉 Congratulations!

Your referral invitation was successful, and a new user has registered using your link! As a token of our gratitude, I have activated a bonus subscription "Start" for you for 7 days 🎁✅

Enjoy the extended features and thank you for spreading the word about me!
If you have any questions, please feel free to ask. Enjoy your enhanced experience! 🤖🩵
The bot has successfully forgotten the dialogue context 🧹
🫰💵 Not available for users without a subscription
